title: A Secret Way to find background music for YouTube video
tags: A Secret Way to find background music for YouTube video
find background music for YouTube video
description: I personally, dont like to use songs from Youtube library Or any other popular websites. There are often overused and too common.   So, how do you find good quality of music which is unique as well?  Well here is how I do that.  Follow the artist, I follow on Soundcloud -    Here are the free website, that offers background music for YouTube video   You can reach me here  Website -  YouTube -  Facebook - Twitter -  Instagram -   Which background music did I use? Broke For Free - Day Bird   The Passion HiFi - What We Came To Do    What camera do I use?  Canon 70D  What mike do I use? Blue Yeti and Video Mic pro (depends on requirement)  What tripod do I use? Manfrotto MVKBFR  What video editor do I use? Final Cut Pro  My computer do I use? iMac 2015 for editing and a ThinkPad for casual work
